committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide reduced retirement benefits for Members of Congress who remain in office after attaining seventy years of age.

summary.text: Reduces the retirement annuity of a Member of Congress by 10 percent for each full year by which the age of the Member at the time of retirement exceeds 70.

titles.title: A bill to provide reduced retirement benefits for Members of Congress who remain in office after attaining seventy years of age.
